sentences.english: Treasure Island , which was written by Stevenson , is a popular book.
sentences.chinese: 《寶島》是史蒂文森著的，是一本暢銷書。

sentences.english: The  Olympics is just the  gateway to that island.
sentences.chinese: 而奧運會只是進入寶島的大門。

sentences.english: We were told that we should sight the Treasure island that night.
sentences.chinese: 我們被告知那天夜裏我們就要看見寶島了。

sentences.english: Family fun in the pool, Treasure Island Resort, Treasure Island.
sentences.chinese: 珍寶島酒店，泳池裏的家庭歡樂時光。

definition: variant of 臺灣|台湾[Tai2 wan1]
Pingtung city, county and military airbase in south Taiwan
fellow countryman (from the same village)/local people/villager/the folks back home
Kinmen or Quemoy islands off the Fujian coast, administered by Taiwan/Jinmen county in Quanzhou 泉州[Quan2 zhou1], Fujian, PRC
opposite bank (of a body of water)
Xiamen or Amoy, subprovincial city in Fujian, abbr. 廈|厦[Xia4]
Hualien, city and county on the east coast of Taiwan
Taibei or Taipei, capital of Taiwan
villager/(Tw) (Internet slang) person who likes to follow online discussions and add their opinions
